document_data.name: Isarr Kronenstrom
document_data.mainbody: '''Isarr Kronenstrom''', also known as the '''Wolf King''', was a [[Malar]]ite chieftain who led a clan of [[Tribe of the Wolf]] barbarians in [[Icewind Dale]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Template:Cite book/Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden|307}}
document_data.Personality: Chief Kronenstrom was a vicious and brutal man who inspired fear in all the folks across the dale.
document_data.Abilities:
He had an exceptional sense of hearing and smell. Whenever he attacked a foe who had spilt blood, Kronenstrom went into a complete frenzy.

Fitting to his name, the chieftain would let out howls to communicate with his allied tribesmen.
document_data.Possessions: He wielded a [[sickle]] and a [[heavy crossbow]] in battle.
document_data.Relationships: While the Wolf King only garnered support from a small number of Wolf Tribe barbarians, his followers were particularly loyal and ferocious. Other chieftains believed themselves too weak to challenge his rule.
document_data.History: Around the {{YearlinkName|1489}}, Chieftain Kronenstrom led the assault on a camp of his fellow [[Reghedmen]] barbarians, also of the Tribe of the Wolf. The only survivor was the son of the camp's chieftain, [[Aerix Vokototh]].{{Template:Cite book/Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden|211}}
